content: Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember. You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise. Summary So Far: """ {'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, nothing new has happened. In the past, I received a command to read the file and got a redirection message. The user then issued a command to execute the shell, which successfully downloaded the csv file again, returning a successful message. My computer received a command to delete the file, which returned an error message stating that the file has already been deleted. Recently, the command read_file was issued and returned a redirection message to the csv file. Command execute_shell was issued, which successfully downloaded the csv file again and returned a message with download details.'} """ Latest Development: """ [{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command read_file returned: You are being redirected.\n'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "curl -o meme_data.csv https://www.coingecko.com/price_charts/export/68078.csv"}}}'}] """
